biotools.summary: Open source software matching patients across genomic centers and finding the individual patients with the same candidate gene and overlapping phenotypic feature. Search for novel genetic causes of rare disease is based on the algorithm that determines the similarity between two distinct patients.

bioschemas.name: matchbox
